fullText: This Dublin-set musical hits all the right notes. The show is a rare gem that feels authentic and unforced.
dtliExcerpt: This Dublin-set musical hits all the right notes. The show is a rare gem that feels authentic and unforced.
bwwExcerpt: The wonderful musical “Once” is the sweetest and most romantic show on Broadway and proves that not all love stories lead to the bedroom. [...] The show’s creators deserve kudos for staying faithful to the movie without taking a tracing-paper approach in retelling it.
